head.citation-title: Proceedings of 8th International Conference on Recent Advances in Space Technologies, RAST 2017
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 93 papers. The topics discussed include: contribution of GNSS in precision agriculture; hybrid rocket engine design with multi-objective vibrational genetic algorithm; the role of Venezuelan space technology in promoting development in Latin America; ant colony optimization approach for satellite broadcast scheduling problem; collision avoidance dynamics for optimal impulsive collision avoidance maneuvers; space research and extraterrestrial construction industry; boosted dart optimization for maximum altitude on 120 mm diameter booster; wide-area spaceborne maritime surveillance system; comperative analysis of different geometric correction methods for very high resolution Pleiades images; pretest setup installation of the METU-DBL project to perform space radiation tests; finite time eigenaxis rotation using quaternion feedback; design of solar powered subscale glider for CanSat competition; a simultaneous dual channel communication concept over 4d arrays in satellite networks; inspection of the machined features created at the embedded sensor aluminum plates; thermal analysis and testing of different designs of lanthanum hexaboride hollow cathodes; and how does inventory performance affect operational performance? an example from U.S. space vehicles and aircraft parts industries.
